TopicTitle: Naval battle between the EO and the KUSC [Stock]

Articles.Content:
I'm not entirely certain if this belongs here, but I recently set up a large naval battle in KSP. Both organisations are just getting to grips combat on the high seas, so this battle could go either way. In addition, my channel does have a story-driven series, similar to Macey's old videos. I hope you enjoy. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
